vote.text: Amendment SA 5020 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5020 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S9732-9733; text: CR S9733) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5020 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5020 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
